sen.j: 吉田のしだれ桜（よしだのしだれざくら）は、京都府舞鶴市吉田地区にあるサクラ。
sen.e: Yoshida no Shidarezakura is a cherry tree located in the area of Yoshida, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Yoshida no Shidarezakura is a cherry tree located in the area of Yoshida, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Yoshida no Shidarezakura is a cherry tree located in the area of Yoshida, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 樹齢300年といわれる古木と樹齢80年の二対の若木の桜で、観桜シーズンには桜が咲き乱れる。
sen.e: They are a pair of three hundred years old ancient tree and eighty years old young tree, and they fully bloom during the cherry blossom watching season.
They are a pair of trees, one ancient aged three hundred years, and a younger one aged eighty years. The trees come to full bloom during the cherry blossom watching season.
They are a pair of trees, the ancient one said to be aged three hundred years, and the younger one aged eighty years; the trees come to full bloom during the cherry blossom watching season.

sen.j: 勅勘をこうむり、丹後に配流となった公家の権中納言中院通勝卿の心をなぐさめるため、親しい友人が京都より苗木を送つたことに始まるといわれる。
sen.e: It began when a close friend sent a plant from Kyoto to console the heart of Michikatsu NAKANOIN, who was the kuge (court noble) and Gon Chunagon (Provisional Middle Counselor) that defied the order of the emperor and was exiled to Tango.

It began when a close friend sent a plant from Kyoto to console the heart of Michikatsu NAKANOIN, who was the kuge (court noble) and Gon Chunagon (Provisional Middle Counselor) that defied the order of the emperor and was exiled to Tango.

It began when a close friend sent a plant from Kyoto to console the heart of Michikatsu NAKANOIN, who was the kuge (court noble) and Gon Chunagon (Provisional Middle Counselor) that defied the order of the emperor and was exiled to Tango.

sen.j: 当しだれ桜は舞鶴市吉田地区の曹洞宗瑠璃寺境内に位置し、なかでも樹齢300年といわれる古木は幹周囲2.52m、高さ7mにもなる。
sen.e: This Shidarezakura is located within compound of the Ruri-ji Temple of the Soto sect of Zen Buddhism, and the three hundred years old ancient tree has a trunk circumference of 2.52m and height of 7m.
This Shidarezakura is located within compound of the Ruri-ji Temple of the Soto sect of Zen Buddhism, and the three hundred years old ancient tree has a trunk circumference of 2.52m and height of 7m.

This Shidarezakura is located within the compound of the Ruri-ji Temple of the Soto sect of Zen Buddhism, and the three hundred years old ancient tree has a trunk circumference of 2.52 meters and height of 7 meters.
sen.cmt: meters の前にスペースを追加しました。

sen.j: その景観の素晴らしさから舞鶴市の文化財にも指定された。
sen.e: Due to the wonderfulness of its sight, it is also designated as the cultural asset of Maizuru City.
Due to the wonderfulness of its sight, it is also designated as a cultural asset of Maizuru City.
Due to the wonderfulness of its sight, it is also designated as a cultural asset of Maizuru City.

sen.j: 観桜シーズンにはライトアップされるため、夜間観桜も可能である。
sen.e: It is lightened up during the cherry blossom season, and is possible to view the cherry tree at night.
It is lit up during the cherry blossom season, and is possible to view the cherry tree at night.
It is lit up during the cherry blossom season, and is possible to view the cherry tree at night.

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に小文字に変更しました。

sen.e: Bathroom: Present
Bathroom: Present
Bathroom: Available

sen.j: 売店・販売：なし（ライトアップ時には屋台が出る）
sen.e: Kiosk or Shops: Not available (There are vendors present during the light up season).
Kiosk or Shops: Not available (There are vendors present during the light up season).
Kiosk or shops: Not available (There are vendors present during the light up season).
sen.cmt: shops 小文字にしました。

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道舞鶴西インターチェンジ
sen.e: Maizuru Nishi (Maizuru West) Interchange located on Maizuru Wakasa Expressway.
Maizuru Nishi (Maizuru West) Interchange located on Maizuru Wakasa Expressway.
Maizuru Nishi (Maizuru West) Interchange located on Maizuru Wakasa Expressway.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 西舞鶴駅 からバス (交通機関)で約25分
sen.e: Twenty-five minute bus (commuter) ride from Nishi Maizuru Station on Maizuru Line, West Japan Railway (JR).
Twenty-five minute bus (commuter) ride from Nishi Maizuru Station on Maizuru Line, West Japan Railway (JR).
Twenty-five minute bus (commuter) ride from Nishi-Maizuru Station on Maizuru Line, West Japan Railway (JR West).
